Errors.MISSING_DATA_LOGIN: Sorry, you must enter all required data.
Errors.INCORRECT_DATA_LOGIN: Sorry, the entered data is incorrect. Please try again.
Errors.EMAIL_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, the entered email address was not found. Please try again.
Errors.MISSING_DATA_SIGNUP: Sorry, you must enter all required data.
Errors.INCORRECT_DATA_SIGNUP: Sorry, the entered data is incorrect. Please try again.
Errors.PASSWORD_NOT_MATCH_SIGNUP: Sorry, the entered passwords do not match. Please try again.
Errors.ACCOUNT_ALREADY_EXISTS_SIGNUP: Sorry, an account with the entered email address already exists. Please try again.
Errors.FAILED_AUTHENTICATION: Sorry, we could not authenticate your data. Please try again.
Errors.ACCESS_DENIED: Sorry, you do not have permission to perform this operation. Please try again.
Errors.INVALID_FOLDER: Sorry, the selected folder is invalid. Please try again.
Errors.FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS: Sorry, a file with the entered name already exists. Please rename the file and try again.
Errors.FILE_DOESNT_EXIST: Sorry, the file was not found. Please try again.
Errors.FOLDER_DOESNT_EXIST: Sorry, the folder was not found. Please try again.
Errors.ERROR_WHILE_DELETING_FILE: Sorry, an error occurred while deleting the file. Please try again.
Errors.ERROR_WHILE_UPLOADING_FILE: Sorry, an error occurred while uploading the file. Please try again.
Errors.ZIP_CREATION_ERROR: Sorry, an error occurred while creating the zip archive. Please try again.
Errors.EMAIL_ALREADY_ADMIN: Sorry, the entered email address is already an administrator. Please try again.
Errors.EMAIL_NOT_ADMIN: Sorry, the entered email address is not an administrator. Please try again.
Errors.EMAIL_ALREADY_WHITELISTED: Sorry, the entered email address is already whitelisted. Please try again.
Errors.EMAIL_NOT_WHITELISTED: Sorry, the entered email address is not whitelisted. Please try again.
Errors.PASSWORD_NOT_MATCH: Sorry, the entered passwords do not match. Please try again.
Errors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: Sorry, an unknown error occurred. Please try again.
